extends Remote

      • updateChat

        void updateChat(ChatRoom r)
                throws RemoteException
        updateChat, this method is called by the chatroom when something happens, e.g if a client posts a message to the room, a client joins/leaves the room etc.

        id - id of the room that was destroyed
